name: SPYRAL GEAR - Fully Armed
effectText: Equip only to "SPYRAL Super Agent". It gains 1000 ATK. If it destroys your opponent's monster by battle: You can banish both the opponent's destroyed monster and 1 other card your opponent controls. When this face-up card on the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 "SPYRAL Super Agent" in your Graveyard; Special Summon it.
